nodes.text: The CS-Mark 10, also known as the Imperial Command Combat Simulator was a device that provided historical simulations of the Galactic Empire's greatest battles. The device held 12 historical simulations and a "scenario editor" feature that provided the user with the ability to design their own hypothetical scenarios or recreate other historical battles. Of the twelve battles included, the Siege of Trasemene, the Assault on Vardoss IV and the Battle of Galboron were three battles advertised by Galladinium Galactic Exports.
